title: Saudi FM phones Qureshi; discuses Kashmir, regional developments
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 9 (APP):Foreign Minister of Saudi Arabia Faisal bin Farhan Al Saud telephoned Foreign Minister Makhdoom Shah Mahmood Qureshi Saturday and discussed the issue of Kashmir as well as the regional developments.
The two foreign ministers reaffirmed the strategic importance of the Pakistan-Saudi Arabia relationship and reiterated the shared resolve to deepen bilateral cooperation in diverse fields, a Foreign Office press release said.
Foreign Minister Qureshi appreciated Saudi Arabiaâ€™s steadfast support for the Kashmir cause, including as a key member of the OIC Contact Group on Jammu and Kashmir.
Both the sides also exchanged views on working together to advance the Kashmir cause, including from the OIC platform, besides discussing the regional developments and agreeing to remain in close contact.
